Label.text: PleaseÂ enter a Date From that is less than or equal to Date Thru of contract: #slogan#.
Please enter a Date From that is less than or equal to Date Thru of tactics #item#.
At least one Product is required.
Only the responsible User can delete this Contract.
A contract in Phase committed cannot be deleted.
Date Thru of tactics: #item# has to be less than or equal to Date Thru of Customer Contract: #slogan#
Date From of tactics: #item# has to be greater or equal Date From of Customer Contract: #slogan#
